title: The lilac sunbonnet :
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: " Hush ! hush ! " said the sheep Avho were straggling over the shorter grass of the High Park, feeding fitfully in their short, uneasy way — crop, crop, crop — and then a pause, to move forward their own length and begin all over again.

title: The Lilac Sunbonnet: A Love Story
author: Crockett, S. R. (Samuel Rutherford)
snippet: "Hush! hush!" said the sheep who were straggling over the shortergrass of the High Park, feeding fitfully in their short, uneasyway--crop, crop, crop--and then a pause, to move forward their ownlength and begin all over again.

title: Lilac Sunbonnet
author: Crockett, Samuel Rutherford.
snippet: " Hush ! hush !" said the sheep who were straggling over the shorter grass of the High Park, feedingfitfully in their short, uneasy way—crop, crop, crop—and then after a pause, moving forward each his ownlength and beginning all over again.

title: The Stickit minister's wooing,
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: Then we knew that something extraordinary was coming,  and I was glad I had not " threeped " to my mother that I had seen some of the Nether Xeuk sheep in our High Park — which would have been quite true, for I had put them there myself on purpose the night before.
